content.query:
IF (EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.credentials WHERE name = 'bdbjsqlapiqingtest'))
DROP CREDENTIAL[bdbjsqlapiqingtest]
GO

CREATE CREDENTIAL [bdbjsqlapiqingtest]
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', 
SECRET = 'pzQibicjdf49Aoacwj8vDRytwFQTXfKnShLfavYVqfUyaiWy9P9uvi6Zo1TR7M396HOgUCNn4QS8MPJDnzztUA=='
GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=bdbjsqlapiqingtest;Database=sqlapidatabaseqingtest',
                OBJECT = 'container02',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'bdbjsqlapiqingtest'
) AS [container02]
